text: Haji Ghulam Ali (Urdu: حاجی غلام علی) is a Pakistani Politician and a Member of Senate of Pakistan. ==Political career== In March 2009 he was elected to the Senate of Pakistan on general seat as Jameet Ulema Islam (F) candidate. He is the chairperson of senate committee on Commerce and Textile Industry, and member: committee of States and Frontier Regions, Inter-Provincial Coordination and Parliamentary Affairs. ==See also== * List of Senators of Pakistan * Ayatullah Durrani * Hafiz Hamdullah ==References== Category:Living people Category:Pashtun people Category:Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam (F) politicians Category:Members of the Senate of Pakistan Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Haji Ghulam Ali
